titleStmt.title: The soules conflict with it selfe, and victory over it self by faith a treatise of the inward disquietments of distressed spirits, with comfortable remedies to establish them / by R. Sibbs ...
titleStmt.author: Sibbes, Richard, 1577-1635.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M.F. for R. Dawlman at the Brazen serpent in Pauls-churchyard,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: tightly bound and stained with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
